description: Netlify is a platform for building and deploying websites and apps.

actions.name: get_site
actions.description: Get a specified site. Note: Environment variable keys and values have moved from build_settings.env and repo.env to a new endpoint. Please use getEnvVars to retrieve site environment variables.

actions.name: list_files
actions.description: Returns a list of all the files in the current deploy.

actions.name: list_site_deploys
actions.description: Returns a list of all deploys for a specific site.

actions.name: start_deploy
actions.description: Triggers a new build for a site on Netlify. Supports clearing build cache.

triggers.name: new_deploy_failed
triggers.description: Fires when a site deploy fails.

triggers.name: new_deploy_started
triggers.description: Fires immediately when a deploy job starts on your Netlify site.

triggers.name: new_deploy_succeeded
triggers.description: Fires when a new site version has successfully deployed.

triggers.name: new_form_submission
triggers.description: Fires when a Netlify form submission is received.
